import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const MaintenancePage = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('errors.maintenanceTitle')}

{t('errors.maintenanceMessage')}

{t('errors.checkBack')}

); }; export default MaintenancePage;
